titles.title: A resolution commending and congratulating the Las Vegas Aces basketball team on winning the 2022 Women's National Basketball Association championship.
A resolution commending and congratulating the Las Vegas Aces basketball team on winning the 2022 Women's National Basketball Association championship.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: This resolution congratulates the Las Vegas Aces on winning the 2022 Women's National Basketball Association championship and completing a successful 2022 season.
